items.title: Operations Manager
items.description: Atlas Logistique - Humanitarian logistics project focused on access, analysis and capacity building in a multi-risk environment.
bullets: Strategic and operational coordination of Atlas Logistique in Madagascar
Implementation of the IVL tool (Logistics Vulnerability Index) and transfer to the national disaster agency (BNGRC)
Training and capacity building for humanitarian, governmental and private actors
Support for logistics coordination mechanisms (BNGRC, PHSP, WFP, clusters...)
Identification and supervision of access diagnostics in remote areas
Representation, partnership development, and external positioning of HI in humanitarian logistics
Team management and operational planning in a context of logistical constraints and cyclonic risks
